DEMO_103_MSG_010:
́Alright-alright! Looks like ya found the Control Room, ȁ!
ā
DEMO_103_MSG_020: ́Go on now, press that switch in front o' ya to activate the Backup Power Systems.
DEMO_103_MSG_030:
́Well, would ya look at that! That did the trick alright...
However, there's still more to do.
ā
DEMO_103_MSG_040:
́First things first... yer gonna need to activate the Power 
Generators. I'll mark 'em on yer map with red "!" markers.
DEMO_103_MSG_050:
́Hurry up and find 'em! You'll know you seen 'em when you
spot the two big red monitors, ȁ!
DEMO_103_MSG_060:
́Touch both monitors to bring both Generators back online.
Once ya got that done, go back to this Control Room.
DEMO_103_MSG_070: ́I'll explain the next steps once yer done. We're countin' on ya, ȁ!
